Description:
FULLY FENCED & THE PERFECT LOCATION!!!!
Positioned in the highly sort after and popular Highgrove Estate, this generously sized NORTH FACING vacant land is the perfect location for you to build your dream home. With its 14 meter FRONTAGE you will be spoiled for choice in deciding on a plan for your next build.
A street away from the local playground this land is located on a quiet street, yet moments away from the Selandra Rise Shopping Centre, Shopping on Clyde, Clyde Primary School and the Casey Recreation and Aquatic Centre, this is the perfect location for you to call home.
- (10 Mins drive) to M1 entrance
- (2 Min drive) to Berwick Cranbourne Rd
- (10 mins drive) to Eden Rise Shopping Centre
- (5 Min drive) to Shopping on Clyde (Includes a Fuel station)
- (6 Min drive) to Clyde Primary School
- (5 min drive) to Kingswim, Learn to Swim centre
- (5 min drive) to YMCA Early Learning Centre
Future Development
- ( 5 mins Drive) Ramleigh Village Shopping Centre
This Land is FULLY FENCED by the owner leaving you less hassles in building your dream home. Generously sized 448 SQM block of land is of a 14 meter frontage and a 32 meter depth within a well developed area of Highgrove Estate.
Don't miss out, contact me (Visal) on 0410120015 to schedule a private inspection of this land.
Insights: 84 Moxham Drive, Clyde North VIC 3978 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
Prime Commercial Development site
Hardys Road commercial development site is positioned just off the Berwick Cranbourne Road & Hardys Road. The site is set within the Thompson road Precinct Structure Plan (PSP) and shares a boundary with Clyde Creek Precinct Structure Plan. Both PSP's are approved and have construction taking place. Once these two PSP's are completed, there will be about 20,000 new homes built.
Commercial 2 Zone allows (subject to council approval) Cinema, Food & Drink Premises, Mail Centre, Office, supermarket, Warehouse, Education Centre, Motel, Residential Hotel & Transfer station.
Existing factory offers immediate returns while you plan your development
4 Titles all with road frontage broken down as follows:
Lot 1 – 828m2
Lot 2 – 1036m2
Lot 3 – 770m2
Lot 4 – 799m2
Total 3433m2
Hardys Road Project: Hardys Road Clyde North is identified in the Precinct Structure Plans for the Thompsons Road and Clyde Creek Precinct as a future arterial Road.
Development in Clyde North has been rapidly occurring and is now dependent on the construction of Hardys Road as part of the overall precinct road network.
Council has commenced the detailed planning for the construction of Hardys Road generally between Clyde Road and Tuckers Road with provision for the upgrade to progress in a staged manner through to the future Bells Road (Pound Road) intersection.
Whilst every care is taken to supply accurate information our company cannot be held responsible for any incorrect information. It is recommended you satisfy yourself on the accuracy of the content and make your investigations. All measurements are approximately.
Insights: 9-15 Hardys Road, Clyde North VIC 3978 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
Grand Proportions - Absolute Quality
Situated in the esteemed Berwick Waters Estate, is this notable home oozing character as well as exceptional quality. Ideal for the growing family, there is an abundance of space and versatility ready to be taken advantage of! Opposite picturesque wetlands, featuring contemporary, rendered façade with neat gardens, you are drawn inside. The ground level features expansive open plan living, including gourmet kitchen with 40mm stone benchtops, stainless steel appliances, 900mm cooker with powerful range-hood, generous island bench and a convenient WIP. Adjacent, you will find the organically lit family meals, as well as a spacious living area. Completing the first floor is a family theatre or home office, sophisticated powder room with stone finishes and a good-sized laundry. The upper level offers sleeping accommodation. The master bedroom with WIR and ensuite with double basin, jet spa bath and stone vanity top. The three remaining bedrooms are serviced by WIR, modern main bathroom and a children's retreat that completes the indoors living. Refurbished doors and windows add to the quality, with absolutely nothing to do but move in!
Through stacker doors you are met with decked entertainers alfresco and pergola with element blockers - perfect for year-round hosting. The massive yard promises plenty of potential, whether to create your dream garden or introduce a pool - the possibilities are endless!
Creature comforts include but are not limited to; ducted heating, ducted refrigerated cooling, keyless entry, storage, garden shed, and internal access from the double lock up garage with rear roller door.
Close proximity to Berwick Village, Eden Rise Shopping Centre, preeminent schools, freeway access, public transport, medical and sport facilities as well as walking distance to the estate park.
Obtain your dream home today!
Insights: 8 Marshflower Crescent, Clyde North VIC 3978 was last sold in 2019 and 274 other 4 bedroom house in Clyde North have recently been sold.

Description:
Something Special
This stunning home built by award winning SJD Homes, is just two years young. It is situated in the popular prestigious CIRCA estate in Clyde North where your dream life is ready to begin. Nothing but quality in this 29sq URL approx., five bedroom home ~ perfect for a family. Downstairs you will find the fifth bedroom/study, a stunning kitchen which is sure to impress with stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances including electric oven, gas hot plates and dishwasher, walk in pantry and island bench. Add to this a spacious meals area, family room and powder room. Upstairs you will find the glamorous master bedroom which has a large walk in wardrobe, full ensuite with oversized shower, twin vanity and separate toilet. Bedroom two and three have walk in robes, bedroom 4 a double robe and you will just love the enormous rumpus area.. Outside you also have an alfresco for outdoor entertaining plus there is also plenty of space in the large backyard giving lots of options for everyone. Enjoy the generous sized double garage with remote, and internal and rear roller door access. Other great features include quality flooring, ducted heating, air conditioning, neutral interior décor, high ceilings to both levels, double glazed windows, landscaped gardens and generous side access. Also surrounded by quality homes and situated close to tranquil parkland and close to public transport, shops, and the popular Hillcrest Christian School, The Chase Estate and all the facilities you need. Do not hesitate as this fantastic home will be snapped up quickly.

Luxurious 3BD Unit @ Selandra Rise!
This stunning new build 3 bedroom unit creates the perfect family environment! With master bedroom including ensuite and remaining bedrooms with built in robes, what not to love?
This family home includes open plan family living/ dining and Kitchen area plus backyard space to create a beautiful modern feel. Kitchen comes fully equipped with Vinyl wrap and stone bench tops and stainless steel dishwasher included. Extras include ducted heating & 5KW split system air conditioning unit, remote double garage and LED lighting in living areas and hallways and much more.
Full Turn Key Inclusions:
6 star energy rating + long warranty
quality wall to wall carpets
DOWN LIGHTS
stainless steel cook top
stainless steel oven
stainless steel range hood
STONE BENCHTOPS & VANITIES
HEATING & COOLING
Holland blinds
Flyscreens to windows & sliding doors
Front & Rear Landscaping
Plus much, much more
First home buyers who qualify for the grant take $10,000 off this price!
Do not hesitate to call, this unit has everything to offer & will not last long!

Description:
Modern Masterpiece!
First home buyers stop looking, I have found the one!
Have you been searching for your first home; do you have a wish list of what you would love to have? Well I have the home for you!
Welcome to 53 Blackhazel Crescent located in the highly sought after Ramleigh Springs Estate this stunning home is sure to tick all the boxes.
Boasting three bedrooms, master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe and remaining bedrooms with built in robes and catered by the main bathroom.
The generous kitchen paired with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, stone benches and an abundance of bench and storage space. Adjoining the kitchen is the open plan dining and living area perfect to sit back and relax.
If entertaining is what you like I have found the perfect place, leading out from the main living is the over sized decking area
Additional features of the home include floor boards, ducted heating, split system and quality window and light furnishings and double lock up garage with internal access.
Close to Primary and Secondary schools, shops, parks, public transport and much more.
I promise this home will not last long! Call today to book an inspection!

Description:
UNDER OFFER
Opportunities like this rarely become available, if you are looking to move into the perfect family home in an unbeatable location then look no further as this is one residence that will surpass all of your expectations. Boasting highlights such as open plan living, quality finishes, minimal maintenance gardens and endless features, it really will suit the new home buyer with a taste for the finer things in life.
Set in a quiet peaceful location in the highly sought after Selandra Rise estate is this three years young Henley built home which has been upgraded to the highest standards. It offers size, space and a level of appointments that will serve you and your family extremely well for many years ahead.
Boasting open plan living areas including lounge and dining area, home office/theatre room, an entertainers kitchen with 900mm European appliances, an enormous walk-in butlers pantry and undercover alfresco living, this comfortable abode will help you unwind after a long day at work.
Located at the front of the home is the expansive master suite with walk-in robe and ensuite. At the rear of the home you will find three generously sized bedrooms with the added bonus of walk in robes, convenient access to the main bathroom with oversized shower and separate bath and toilet, all of which will be perfect for the growing family. Everything about this home screams quality and exceptional living.
Opening the large rear slider doors of the home and step out onto the covered alfresco area that features landscaped gardens and paths and impressively boasts high quality synthetic turf, you can throw away that lawnmower and enjoy more time on your weekends entertaining family and friends!
This quality property is perfectly located within only minutes walking distance to amenities such as the Wilandra Rise Primary School, the prestigious St Thomas the Apostle Primary School and St. Peters Secondary College, childcare centres, public transport, Selandra Rise shopping centre, Heritage, Hilltop Park and Selandra Youth Park with skate/basketball court with a mesh play area, built in trampolines and a dedicated bbq grounds.
Extra features of the home include ducted heating and split system cooling, alarm system with intercom, remote double garage with internal access, high ceilings and LED downlights the list really does go on. Surrounded by homes of a similar stature, it will impress even the fussiest of buyer.
TO REGISTER YOUR INTEREST click on either of the following tabs and fill in your details, BOOK AN INSPECTION on the Biggin & Scott website or EMAIL AGENT / CONTACT AGENT on Real Estate.com.au and other websites. You will be contacted by one of our agents and will also receive a text advising of inspection times.

Description:
Brilliant Value
This brilliant new home is located in a sought after area and comes with a long list of inclusions. This popular 4 bedroom design features a tiled entry with direct access into the garage, wonderful kitchen with 900mm stainless steel appliances and a walk in pantry with an adjoining meals/living area and a separate lounge/family room. All of the bedrooms have built in robes, whilst the master has an ensuite and a walk in robe. Built ready to move straight into, the home comes with all floor coverings, fences, driveway, gas heating, window blinds, clothesline, TV antenna and much more. Don't delay, make your enquiry today.

Description:
Luxurious Family Home Circa Estate
Positioned perfect, overlooking award winning parkland this cleverly designed floorplan and modern high-end finished home will be loved by many! The residence showcases open plan living creating a magnificent sense of space and comfort, magnificent chef's kitchen with stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances, innovative storage solutions, soft close cabinets and separate pantry. A generous family meals area flows effortlessly into a separate rumpus room ensuring there is room for the whole family. Beautiful stacker doors open to the outdoor alfresco space and an abundance of grassed area completing this fantastic family abode. The upper level comprises of a spacious rumpus for the kids, impressive master suite with walk in robe and full ensuite. Spacious three bedrooms all with built in robes are serviced by the main bathroom. Impressive balcony overlooks the park opposite creating a beautiful aspect for you and your family. Creature comforts to enjoy including but not limited to: ducted heating, evaporative cooling, oversized double remote garage with storage space for the weekend toys and much more. Brilliantly located in the Circa Estate just a stone throw to Berwick, proximity to Hillcrest and Rivercrest College, recreational facilities, Eden Rise Shopping Centre & convenient freeway access.

Description:
Stylish in Selandra with the lot
Located in the well sought-after Selandra Rise community, this quality built home has features galore with nothing to do but move in and enjoy. Sure to impress the most particular of buyers, the functional floorplan boasts a beautiful hostess kitchen, a fantastic entertainers area outside PLUS a stack of extras for the lucky new owners comfort! Perfect for those looking for their first home, down sizers or investors looking for a tidy investment.
Features include:
- Generous Master bedroom with large walk in robe plus en-suite with frameless open shower, floor to ceiling tiles and stone benches.
- 2nd Bedroom with built in robe with upgraded mirrored sliding doors.
- Versatile study area that could also be used as a dining room or converted to a third bedroom ( as per original floorplan)
- Spacious open plan living area with central kitchen and dining.
- Beautiful kitchen includes quality stainless steel appliances, 900mm oven and 5 burner gas stovetop, dishdraw dishwasher, 20mm stone benchtops with breakfast bar, wine rack above fridge, multiple pot draws and walk in pantry.
- For those entertainers there is large sliding door opening up to the huge Merbu deck - complete with WOOD FIRED PIZZA OVEN & BBQ gas point for the BBQ.
- Second bathroom with frameless open shower, stone benches and floor to ceiling tiles.
- Single remote garage with internal access.
- ADDED EXTRAS include: ducted heating AND upgraded refrigerated cooling, downlights, stunning black butt timber flooring throughout, high ceilings, landscaped maintenance free gardens back and front, colorbond fencing AND much, much more.
- For those wanting to feel secure the home comes complete with roller shutters to front windows, security doors to all outside doors and deadlocks to back and front doors.
Selandra Rise was awarded Victoria's best master planned community in the prestigious 2016 UDIA Awards for excellence and it's not hard to see why! The estate was designed to offer everything residents need within walking distance this includes both primary and secondary schools, Selandra Rise shopping centre, community centres, health and childcare services as well as open space, parks, playgrounds and multiple walking tracks. This home is truly unique so you better be quick to organise your inspection before it's gone!!
Insights: 15 Timble Way, Clyde North VIC 3978 was last sold in 2019 and 1 other 2 bedroom house in Clyde North have recently been sold.

******MASSIVE OPPORTUNITY ON A MASSIVE BLOCK******
CLYDE NORTH - RAMLEGH SPRINGS ESTATE: If you have always hoped to build a palatial home on a large parcel of land in Clyde North, one of the fastest growing residential suburbs, then I can confidently say your search is over.
Measuring 648 square meters with a frontage of approx 18 meters and a depth of approx 36 meters, this block would suit most house designs and still leave you with plenty of room for the kids to run around and kick the footy.
Be part of a growing community where you can walk to parks, schools and sporting facilities. Easy access to the Monash Freeway, Berwick and all it has to offer and with Melbourne CBD just 40 minutes away is what makes this very attractive.

Description:
YOUNG, MODERN, AFFORDABLE & CENTRAL!
If you are looking for young modern home that is easy to maintain, affordable and in a very convenient location, then look no further!
- Consisting of 3 spacious bedrooms, main with a full ensuite and walk in robe
- Comfortable and practical open plan living and dining area with sliding doors opening out to the back yard
- Quality fully appointed kitchen with loads of bench and cupboard space plus a walk in pantry
- Well accommodated with a separate main bathroom with bath tub, laundry and powder room
- Features include high ceilings, ducted heating, stainless steel appliances with a 900mm gas stove, rangehood, dishwasher, flooboards throughout, tiled in wet rooms only, carpet in bedrooms and roller window blinds
- Completing this exciting package is a double lock up garage with auto door from Timble Way and a lovely landscaped back yard to enjoy
- Currently leased to great tenants until 5/7/2019 and returning $1474 per calendar month
Ideally located in popular Selandra Rise estate and only a short walk to Selandra Rise Shopping Centre and all amenities nearby.
PLEASE NOTE: PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT ALL INSPECTIONS

Description:
Quality New Home
If you are looking for your first home, perfect investment property or simply looking to downsize, then this an opportunity you cannot afford to miss. This new design features a tiled entry with direct access into the garage, modern kitchen with quality appliances including a dishwasher which adjoins the tiled meals area and the large open plan living room with a sliding door leading outside to a paved alfresco area. There is also a separate theatre room. The master bedroom has an ensuite and a walk in robe whilst the remaining 3 bedrooms all have built in robes. Complete with all floor coverings, plenty of storage throughout, gas heating, fences, driveway, basic landscaping, roller blinds throughout, TV antenna, clothesline and even a letterbox. Do not miss this opportunity.

Description:
5 Star Resort Living
Located in an ever-popular pocket of Clyde North in Berwick Waters on a sweeping private drive is this wonderful near new home ready and waiting for you. This stunning single level home offers four bedrooms across a clever floorplan designed with maximising family space and entertaining in mind. The master bedroom at the front hosts a generous walk-through-robe into a stunning ensuite that would not look out of place at a 5-star resort! The remaining bedrooms all feature built-in-robes and are serviced by a central family bathroom with floor to ceiling tiles, stone benchtops and a freestanding tub. A private theatre room offers a retreat to unwind and watch some great movies. Heading towards the rear of the home a large open-plan living and dining area are adjacent to a stunning gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances including a built-in coffee machine. A large picture window looks over the plunge pool with water feature whilst sliding doors open out to a decked area with a fire pit the perfect place to unwind on a warm afternoon! Creature comforts include ducted heating, ducted cooling, double garage with internal access, European laundry, separate powder room and high-end finishing's throughout the home. Location is superb offering easy access to local schools, shops and the M1 freeway. Be sure to call today to register your interest, as opportunities such as this do not last long!
Insights: 24 Elmtree Crescent, Clyde North VIC 3978 was last sold in 2019 and 274 other 4 bedroom house in Clyde North have recently been sold.

Address: Lot 417/ 110 Hardys Road Clyde North VIC 3978
Description:
TITLED LAND - START BUILDING YOUR DREAM HOME NOW
Immerse yourself in Clyde Springs, a unique residential development with substantial integrated parklands and conveniently located in one of Melbournes most rapidly growing areas. Offering an abundance of opportunities for you and your family to create a bright and prosperous future.
If you are looking for a titled lot rather than a long wait, this is the one for you. Build your dream home with absolute confidence with access to public transport such as extensive bus services and walking distance to the proposed Clyde North town centre and train station, plus access to major arterial roads, including the M1 freeway, South Gippsland Highway.
Lifestyle
Surrounded by extensive open spaces, waterways, parkland and within close proximity to Casey Fields Sporting Complex, Casey Recreation and Aquatic Centre, Cranbourne Royal Botanic Gardens, Golf Course, Racecourse and Library, and an easy half hour drive to the beach.
Education
Ideally located close to a range of well regarded schools and institutions; Chisholm Institute, Monash University Campus, Hillsmeade Primary, St. Catherines Catholic Primary, St. Francis Xavier College, Heritage College, Alkira Secondary College, St. Margarets College and Haleybury College.
Shopping
Clyde Springs enjoys an abundance of shopping centres close by, including Centro Cranbourne, Fountain Gate, Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, Cranbourne Homemaker Centre and Eden Rise Shopping Centre, with a new centre proposed on Hardy Road.
Immerse yourself in Clyde Springs Mountain views, parkland, recycled water for lush green gardens and amazing amenities close by.

Description:
Exquisite family home
A true standout from the crowd, this gorgeous Henley built home is packed with style. Offering a low maintenance lifestyle and with not a finger to lift, this property should be on the top of your inspection list.
Featuring:
- Wide entry hall with double doors.
- Master suite with full ensuite, walk in robe and double vanities.
- Dual shower in ensuite bathroom.
- Hostess kitchen with stone bench top and walk in pantry.
- Open plan kitchen/living adjoining dining area.
- Custom design flooring.
- Theatre room.
- High ceilings and downlights.
- Double remote garage with internal access.
- Ducted heating and evaporative cooling throughout.
- Colorbond roofing.
- Security alarm system.
- Quality window coverings.
Bi-folding glass sliding doors from kitchen and living area opening to a grand decked alfresco with your own private spa makes it an ideal space to relax after a hard day's work.
Well landscaped front and rear lawn and many more upgrades throughout.
Short walk to Fitzwilliam Circuit Playground, Easy access to Linsell Boulevard & Berwick Cranbourne Rds. Short distance to Selandra Shopping Centre including Woolworths and gymnasium. Also close to Wilandra Rise Primary School, St Peters College, Kids on Clyde and St Thomas Primary School.
Call now to arrange your own private inspection.
Photo ID required for access at inspections.
